price: Lakini walimkadhibisha na wakamchinja ngamia, kwa hivyo Mola wao Mlezi aliwaangamiza kwa sababu ya dhambi zao na akawafuta kabisa.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
footnotes: Wakamkadhibisha Mtume wao katika hilo onyo lake, wakamchinja. Mola wao Mlezi akazibomoa nyumba zao kwa sababu ya dhambi zao; akazisawazisha na ardhi!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu faʿaqarūhā fadamdama ʿalayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā
